variants.Description in input context: This variant is likely to affect the function of the SLC25A13 gene, but the exact protein change is not specified.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Partial loss-of-function (based on the assumption that the variant affects splicing)
Readout description.Result Description: The expression level of the SLC25A13 gene was reduced by approximately 40% for the variant NM_001193743.2:c.386C>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.
